title: 'Snow In May': The Lives Of Magadan, Gateway To The Gulag
teaser: Kseniya Melnik's debut collection of short stories portrays life in Magadan, Russia, a town notorious for it's Gulag labor camps. NPR's Rachel Martin talks with Melnik about her book, Snow in May.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
